body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information. As part of the conversation, the customer should ask two questions.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should cover two or three topics, have back and forth between the parties, and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for reaching out to Chuckles Comedy Club customer service. My name is Jesse Williams. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Jesse, my name is Sandra Jackson. How can I help you today?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Sandra. Before we proceed, may I kindly ask for your email address and phone number for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email address is sandrajackson@example.com and my phone number is two one two - three four five - six seven eight nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information. Is there anything specific you would like assistance with today, Sandra?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I have a question. How can I purchase tickets for a comedy show at Chuckles Comedy Club?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great question! You can easily purchase tickets on our website or through our mobile app. Is there anything else you would like to know?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I have one more question. Do you offer group discounts for large bookings at the comedy club?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Absolutely, Sandra. We do offer group discounts for large bookings. You can contact our group sales department for more details on discounts and reservations. Thank you for your time today, Sandra. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out. Have a wonderful day!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Jesse. I appreciate your help. Have a great day too!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Sandra. Take care and goodbye!
